## LocalAuthService.verifyPassword property

Verify a user's password by: - Finding user - Ensuring they are local-auth enabled - Comparing hashes

**Signature:**

```typescript
verifyPassword: ({ data, }: {
        data: {
            password: string;
            identifier: string;
        };
    }) => Promise<UserType>;
```
